text: Within the shunting group, it shall be possible for only one member of the group to transmit the link assurance signal at any time.
When applicable a Security Domain shall Request the OPEN to load, install, extradite, and delete card content,
The Bootstrap Monitor of the DPU-BOOT CSC shall output an error message to the RS-232 interface if an incorrect number of command arguments are entered.

The DPU-SCUI shall be capable of preparing one STPDU for delivery to the SCU every M milliseconds, or shall indicate a No Data condition to the SCU by maintaining an un-incremented ST_PDU Transfer Request Counter field.
If automatic network selection is implemented, it shall be possible for the driver to activate and deactivate automatic network selection.
In order to fulfil the requirements of some railways, it should be possible to provide an alternative means of link assurance indication.
The radio shall support at least ten different languages.

If the call fails in the lead traction vehicle, the lead driver will be responsible for re- establishing the call. If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.

The CNG shall classify packets entering the CPN through its WAN interface (downstream direction) according to a number of predefined priorities. Classification can be done on the basis of different layer 2 and/or layer 3 parameters.
The DPU-ADC CSC shall address hardware modules as defined in document 1400, Company X Specification for the Company X Communication/Memory Module.
The card should use a unique diversified secret key, personalized into the card, to generate and authenticate transaction signatures
The Development Team shall be required to adjust existing source code to use the externallog file only if that source code must be modified to implement another requirement.
The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.
In Image Mode, the DPU-DPA shall be capable of binning images at different levels.
The MMI shall be suitable for use by day and night.
In case of multicast streams the CNG should support proxy functionalities to optimize the management of information related to signalling.
The DPU-EDAC shall record the current contents of EDAC_HK to EEPROM and force a DPU watchdog in the event an MBE in DRAM is detected.
The preferred repair facility shall be returned to the user.
The weight of the General purpose radio including battery should not exceed 250g.
The CNG may allow secure dynamic firewall opening for remote access devices based on NGN authentication functions.
The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.
For the CNG management it is recommended to use a single protocol, so as to minimize the complexity and the cost of the service.

If errors in the card issuer MAC are discovered by the card issuer during its processing of the transactions, a dispute mechanism, established by the scheme provider, may be used to have money refunded
The DPU-DCI shall read from the DCI Registers in C-bit words only
Where pre-emption occurs, an advisory indication may be provided to the pre-empted parties.
Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.
When the handset is picked up, the loudspeaker shall continue to operate, but at a reduced volume level.

The DPU-CCM shall be able to count a consecutively reported error. When the the count for a particular error ID, exceeds 250 for a particular reporting period, the error code will be replaced with a error code sequence which shall include the original error code and the number of times the error was reported.
The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers

If directed network selection and/or automatic network selection are implemented, the driver shall be informed by means of an audible and visual indication of the new network identity whenever a network change takes place without user intervention.
When applicable a Security Domain shall Manage on-card data securely,
The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.
When the traction unit is stationary the driver shall be required to acknowledge the train trip condition. This acknowledgement will release the emergency brake.
The card issuer must have the ability to deactivate a CEP application in the response to a load or currency exchange transaction

The merchant acquirer must acknowledge the receipt of the batch to either the POS device or the merchant. The timing of the acknowledgment will vary based on the collection process. After a batch has been acknowledged by the merchant acquirer, it may be deleted from the POS device
When the CNG detects violation of the privacy protection policy the CNG shall discard all signalling, including signalling from the NGN.
The commands received by a GlobalPlatform card shall be processed by the OPEN or dispatched to the selected Application for processing.
A dedicated Push-To-Talk button shall be provided.
The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.
The DPU-ICUI shall format messages according to DPUICD-01, Section 3.1
If shunting mode is implemented, the link assurance tone shall be provided via the loudspeaker.
Systems supporting OM should be able to electronically record and store data from remote devices that may be uploaded to an aggregating system.
For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.
Traffic marking: depending on what are the parameters used to perform classification, CNDs or CNG itself on behalf of the CNDs shall be able to modify the packets priority.

Currency exchange rates for an unlinked load transaction must be established according the rules of the network or networks processing the transaction. However, for linked load transactions, the currency exchange rates must be established by the card issuer
The DPU-CCM shall quietly discard any unrecognized observatory messages (I.e. messages which do not have a DPU command APID).
If the user requests experience service timeout (threshold), initiation request is cancelled.
The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.
All design, testing and installation of EIRENE mobile radio equipment shall comply with the quality procedures defined in ISO 9001 . Climatic conditions
In the case of an unsuccessful completion, exception processing outlined in the On-line Exception Processing section is performed
A speech connection shall be established immediately following the warning tone, to allow the originator of the emergency call, to give information concerning the nature of the emergency.
The DPU-TMALI shall allocate a ring buffer of size specified by TMALI_BUFFER_SIZE provided during initialization for storing incoming frames of data. The default buffer size shall be 15 MB.
When applicable a Security Domain shall Provide cryptographic protection services for its own Applications during their personalization and optionally during their subsequent operation,
If the call is a broadcast call, the user shall be informed that he cannot speak as part of the broadcast call.
The PSAM authenticates that the purchase transaction being canceled was performed by the PSAM, and that the transaction being canceled is part of the active batch
Avoiding link overload: Text pages containing large proportions of links should be formatted so that the presence of links does not impede the readability of the text.
The CNG shall allow the customer remote access to a CND in the Customer Network, for example a surveillance video camera.
Internally to the CPN, a CNG transmitting private or other critical information (i.e. to a CND) shall protect the data from unauthorised disclosure.
The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.

If the POS device supports multiple applications or multiple transaction types, an interaction between the terminal and consumer or sales agent determines the CEP application and the function to be performed (cancel last purchase transaction)
The VCD system MUST provide an interface where an economic operator can add structural data of evidence that belong to specific evidence.
In the case of a reversal, the CEP card must re-authenticate the PSAM
Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.
The product will record meeting acknowledgements.
The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.
If the transaction is to be aggregated, the amount of the transaction must be added to the aggregation record for the card issuer
When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.
On indication received at the CNG of a resource allocation expiry the CNG shall delete all residual data associated with the invocation of the resource.

Once the driver has accepted the standard point-to-point call, it shall be connected appropriately, eg if the driver has accepted the call by lifting the handset, then the call shall be routed to the handset.
The group identity of the voice group call (VBS or VGCS) shall be displayed.
The Development Team shall be required to adjust existing source code to follow acceptedcoding standards only if that source code must be modified.
The Bootstrap Monitor of the DPU-BOOT CSC shall validate commands entered for syntax and number of arguments.
A customer can only stream a movie if they purchased it and are within the 2 day viewing period.
Off-line PIN verification must include both encrypted and unencrypted PIN
Expired cards must not be used for loading electronic value
The trainborne equipment shall remain in Full Supervision until the trainborne equipment is not active any longer, when Shunting is selected or when Partial Supervision information is received.

Depending on the operation mode chosen (bridged or touted) and on the type of flow treated (unicast or multicast) the CNG shall forward packets only to the physical interfaces which are connected to devices interested to the IPTV flow.
If the number of logical channels supported by the OPEN is not sufficient to open a new Supplementary Logical Channel, return the appropriate error.

The website should have an African feel but should not alienate non-Africans. The website should use animation on pages which are describing the services to grab the users attention and encourage them to sign up.
The DPU-TIS shall provide the capability for an application program to jam the value of the SC_TIME into the hardware, if automatic time synchronization is disabled.

Where an on-train bus is connected to the Cab radio, deregistration of functional numbers can be performed on an individual basis and also by the train driver, by one action for all users (including the driver), at the end of the journey when the train number is no longer associated with the train.
When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself as an available player in the list of players.
The image mode shall consist of a science window.
Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.
The system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest ratings for the input criteria
The DPU-SCUI, in the event of a buffer full condition, shall discard new data, return an error to the caller, and report an error condition to the DPU-CCM.
The functional number shall consist of numeric characters only.
The DPU-CCM shall support a NOOP command that does nothing but serve as a valid command.
The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.

Epidemiological (epi) data must be collected to assist in the case investigation of events. Standard epi data to be collected includes: onset date and time of symptoms, type of symptoms, risk factors, medical history data, laboratory data, procedure data, and questionnaire responses.

During a purchase transaction, the CEP card must ensure that it is dealing with an authentic POS device, and it must generate a signature to allow the card issuer to verify the integrity of the transaction
Using train data and infrastructure data, braking curves shall be calculated taking into account the target information but not the location of vehicles occupying the track.

The electronic purse product must use dynamic data authentication at the following points: 1. Load 2. Unload 3. Currency Exchange 4. Purchase, Purchase Reversal 5. Incremental Purchase 6. Cancel Last Purchase 7. Personalization 8. On-line Updates to the Application
Every user of the system shall be authenticated and authorized.
The driver shall be informed if a broadcast call is ongoing by a visual indication displayed on the MMI.
When observing a new GRB, and the XRT_POS becomes available from the ICU, the DPU-DPA shall shift and resize the image and event windows appropriately.
All business rules specified in the Disputes System shall be in compliance with the Merchant Operating Regulations.
The timing of payment to the merchant must be established between the merchant and the merchant acquirer
No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.
Direct access to attestations issued by (national) issuing bodies MUST be established through organisational agreements (e.g. service level agreements).
Every pilot partner MUST follow the common standard schema of context specific data by defining a national version of it.
After investigation, if the merchant acquirer decides, based on scheme rules, to accept the transactions, a method must exist to settle them and forward them to the card issuer

All members of the shunting group, other than the initiator of the link assurance signal, shall be unable to speak during the transmission of the link assurance signal. However, they shall be able to initiate a shunting emergency call at any time.
It shall be possible for an incoming call or data message for one user to be forwarded to another user using functionality provided by the network.
The Bootstrap Monitor of the DPU-BOOT CSC shall follow the protocol specified in BSPS-01, Bootstrap Monitor Protocol Specification, with the following noted exceptions.
Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
Cab radios shall provide a means of preventing tampering.
If run-time diagnostics are implemented, all failures should be available to be recorded in a train-borne recorder.
The system shall follow HIPAA compliance capabilities in new functionality introduced to the system.
After the 30 second period, if the connection was unsuccessful, the system shall provide another audible and visual indication that it was unable to connect the call.

Only the last increment of an incremental purchase may be reversed. A reversal of a purchase transaction may only occur if: the CEP card has not been removed from the POS device, and the S5 for the transaction to be reversed has not been generated by the PSAM
Specification of keys and signatures used for CEPS on-line authentication is left to the issuer, however MACs passed over shared networks must be no more than 8 bytes long, binary format
The numbering for other teams shall be treated in the same way as maintenance teams
If an ETCS equipped train passes a level transition to one or more levels for which it is not equipped, ETCS shall initiate a brake application.
For increased security and convenience, asymmetric cryptography must be used as the authentication security for off-line transactions
The driver shall be able to override the function when the train is stationary.
In order to ensure interoperability, the service is optional for the ground and mandatory for the Cab radio.
The VCD system MUST detect which attestations can be used by this feature (e.g. they have to be sufficiently described through context specific data and structural data of evidence).
If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.
The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add structural VCD package data to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process.
These merchant acquirers must then assign unique identifiers to PSAMs
An audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call is proceeding.
The product shall provide Portals.The product shall help System Administrators to analyze the transactions with ad-hoc reporting and KPIs (Key Performance Indicators)
Point-to-point calls that are not automatically answered (see table 10-1) shall only be answered once the driver accepts the call.
The transaction signatures ensure end to end integrity of transmitted data for load, unload, and currency exchange transactions
The product shall poll the system for messages every second.The product shall poll the system for new messages at a maximum of every 1 second.

The CNG Remote Management requires to manage a specific set of parameters. At least the following list of parameters shall be available: Customer Identification, Physical Line Identification, list of subscribed services, CNG IP address.
The load device must support on-line PIN encryption or off-line PIN verification
The Basic Logical Channel is the permanently available interface to a GlobalPlatform card and shall be supported by the OPEN.
The issuer sends S2 to the load acquirer in the authorization response message

Activity logs, which are tools for investigators to track their actions during a case, should be supported. For example, investigators may log calls made to monitor symptoms or calls made to schedule follow-up visits.
The product shall be updated on a regular basis.The product will have a new major feature introduced every six months and quarterly maintenance releases every six months.
The DPU-DPA shall collect event mode data, preserving the time and spatial resolution in the specified event window.
If contact with the mobile radio network is lost, then the Cab radio shall give an audible and visual indication.
The load acquirer must keep records by card number of all loads that take place at its load devices
It shall be possible for a user to override the automatic network selection manually. This function shall not be available during calls.
If a SELECT [by name] [first or only occurrence] is received, the search always begins from the start of the GlobalPlatform Registry,
Once received onboard the national values shall remain valid even if the onboard equipment is switched off
Systems supporting OM should have the ability to produce individual reports for each emergency team member or investigator.
The VCD system MUST provide an interface where the economic operator can request the creation of a VCD package.
A network service availability indication shall be provided to the user.
If the supervision is performed by a RBC it shall be possible to prevent movements of a traction unit in its area if not authorised by the RBC.
Purchase transactions that have an invalid MAC are forwarded to the scheme provider for analysis if the scheme provider has established a central error repository
Upon the request of the driver, the Cab radio should be able to perform a suite of run- time diagnostic tests on all physical interfaces.
The DPU-CCM shall notify the ICU upon completion of boot and flight software initialization.
Stored numbers and other set-up details should be protected against accidental alteration.
By default, prompts and information shall be displayed in the language selected by the train owner (as stored within the system).
The required call set-up times shall be achieved in 95% of cases.

The DPU-DCI shall provide an application program with the ability to read the current hardware status, including the Data Level Trigger, the Data Timeout Trigger, the DCI Event Mode, and the Normal/Test Mode.
The VCD viewing system MUST display structural data of evidence contained in the VCD package
If shunting mode is implemented, the functionality to enter or leave shunting mode shall not be available whilst there are on-going calls involving the Operational radio.
The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.
The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.
As multiple Applications on the card may have the same partial AID, it is required that a method exists to select all Applications matching the partial AID.

The land-based part of the system shall provide communications for mobiles when stationary and when travelling at speeds up to the maximum allowable line speed or (Network selection requirements for mobiles have been moved to sections 5, 6 and 7).
Funds issuers must accept funds authorization requests, regardless of the load currency type, as permitted
If run-time diagnostics are implemented, diagnostic tests shall not interfere with normal operation of the Cab radio.

If Home to Home (H2H) communication service is provided, then each CNG must ensure that emergency service sessions originating in its CPN are associated with the appropriate location information and/or calling identity.

If no full or partial match is found at all, the currently selected Application on the Basic Logical Channel shall remain the selected Application and - If the SELECT [by name] command has the [first or only occurrence] parameter set, the SELECT command is dispatched to the Application, - If the SELECT [by name] command has the [next occurrence] parameter set, the OPEN shall return the appropriate error to the off-card entity,

It shall be possible for all shunting drivers and shunting group members to receive a shunting emergency call from any equipment capable of taking part in shunting communications. The shunting emergency call shall cause the audible link assurance signal to be interrupted.
A mobile may be a member of a number of groups. It shall be possible to activate or deactivate the mobiles subscription to these groups.
Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.
If a user, other than the shunting leader, attempts to make another call whilst being an active member of a shunting group, the attempt shall be ignored.
The product shall be able to process 10 000 transactions per hour within two years of its launch. This number will increase to 20 000 by Release 2.
The system must protect the integrity of key transaction data including transaction identification, currency code and amount. If tampering is suspected, the system must cause the transaction to fail
Where a change of functional number is required, it shall be possible for the user to initiate the change.
In case of unmanaged services, user shall be able to access a QoS configuration function implemented in the CNG.
The train speed shall be at or below a speed specified by a national value.
Systems supporting OM must support capturing dynamic, event-specific data that describes contact between two subjects.
On-line authentication must take place between the card issuer and the CEP card for load, unload, and currency exchange transactions
Entering or overwriting data manually by the driver shall be possible but only when stationary.
If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.
The driver shall be able to terminate communications (voice or data) by selecting another call.
The Disputes System shall generate a User Report that details any new users that have been added and any changes to an existing users access level. The report will be reviewed for auditing purposes.
When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.

If the card is in the Life Cycle State CARD_LOCKED or TERMINATED, the Application with the Final Application privilege is the selected Application on the Basic Logical Channel and the OPEN shall not attempt to identify the implicitly selectable Application
Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.
A VCD system MUST provide a functionality to decompose an existing VCD package
The functional identity shall be presented to the user in a form which can be readily understood (eg driver of train abcd rather than abcd01 or xyz shunting team 3 rather than xyz03).
Reception of this call (if implemented) shall proceed as for a standard group or broadcast call except that a distinctive audible and visual indication shall be provided.
If decided by a national value, the driver may release the ETCS emergency brake when the actual speed is below the permitted speed.
Using a simple MMI action, it shall be possible for the driver to view a prioritised list of all authorised mobile radio networks (see section 10.5).

The VCD system MUST provide a functionality to validate the provided context specific data during the submission process of context specific data to ensure the data is consistent with the VCD advanced package schema.
Applications should Expose only data and resources that are necessary for proper application functionality
The supervised Shunting speed shall be indicated to the driver on request.
It shall be possible to assign up to a minimum of 3 functional numbers to an EIRENE user at any one time.
The terminal must participate in a two-way authentication process with the card
The system shall log an error message to the external data file when the user is directed tothe [SYSTEM NAME] error page.
The GlobalPlatform API shall provides services to the card content management such as card locking and application life cycle state update
The count of aggregated transactions in the aggregation record must be increased by 1
The on/off control should be designed to prevent accidental activation/deactivation.
A special MMI action shall be required for a General purpose radio user to send a Railway emergency call.
Telephone numbers can be defined on a national basis, but codes for certain functions shall be used on an international basis in order to allow interoperability.
The link assurance signal should be used to reassure the driver of the integrity of the member at the head of the shunting movement.
The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.
Where available, the functional identity of the calling party shall be displayed.
Unload transactions do not require cardholder authentication. (However, an acquirer??s devices may be configured such that authentication is required for access.)

If the train or the shunting movement exceeds the permitted ceiling speed by a certain harmonised margin, the trainborne equipment shall execute a brake intervention until the actual speed does not exceed permitted speedthen the driver shall be able to release the brake
It shall be possible to command a conditional emergency stop. If the train has already passed the location for the emergency stop the command shall be ignored

If a full or partial match is found and this Application cannot be selected due to a multi-selection restriction or because the Application refuses selection (e.g. because it does not support the current card interface), continue searching through the GlobalPlatform Registry for a subsequent full or partial match. If no subsequent full or partial match is found, the OPEN shall return the appropriate error to the off-card entity,

On cards that support logical channels, if a MANAGE CHANNEL [close] is received, terminate the Application Session currently selected on the Supplementary Logical Channel indicated by the command and then close that logical channel. The Basic Logical Channel can never be closed.
The trackside shall be able to send information for the calculation of speed profiles.
The Bootstrap Monitor of the DPU-BOOT CSC shall provide the capability to load a configuration of the DPU-RTOS from EEPROM to DRAM and start its execution on command.

When forwarding packets from the customer network to the WAN interface, the CNG shall manage a number of queues corresponding to the different priorities detected in the classification phase for each packet processed.
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.

Electronic questionnaires must be developed and validated. They will be designed by investigators to collect common data elements (e.g., patient demographics, test results, exposure contacts), agent-specific data elements (e.g., specific laboratory test), and other customized data elements.
The functional identity of the connected party, if available, shall be displayed to the user.
If the leads score falls within the low average then it will be returned to the supplying vendor
If run-time diagnostics are implemented, failure of an interface shall be reported to the driver via the display.
The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.
The Cab radio may need to conserve battery power when the radio is powered up but the MMI is switched off.
The VCD system MUST have the status of a trusted system.
The Cab radio shall have a reconfigurable list of stored numbers that may be used to perform abbreviated dialling to named user identities.
Linking back to the home page or landmark pages: Each page should contain a link leading to the home page of the application or to a landmark page that is easy to recognize for the user.
The Card Issuer is responsible for Determining policy with regards to card and Application Life Cycle management, velocity checking levels, privileges, and other security parameters,
When tracking is enabled, the DPU-DPA will produce a PROD_TRACKING_REC at the commanded rate.
The system should support secure virtual private network connections
The DPU-BOOT CSC shall put the processor into diagnostic mode.
STB or media gateways should be equipped with a programmable open API allowing the implementation of specific service logics.
The information regarding lowering and raising of the pantograph and opening/closing of the circuit breaker shall be provided separately and in combinations.
During a Cancel Last Purchase transaction, the CEP card is authenticated by the PSAM in the POS device
The Application Provider is responsible for Providing load file data block signatures according to its own security policy for integrity and source authenticity,
Multiple public identities on the same terminal shall be supported.
The card issuer determines whether to allow the load to complete, and generates S2, which secures the issuer's decision and that the issuer received the same data used by the card
Additional information may also be provided if available from external systems.
The co-operative revocation of the MA shall be possible to a new target location, proposed from RBC.
Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.
The solution should provide detailed context-sensitive help material for all the possible actions and scenarios on all user interfaces in the application.
When streaming a movie the buffering time should take no longer than 10 seconds (plus any latency on the users connection.)
The driver shall be able to select Train Data Entry on the DMI.

It shall be possible for the user to display a list of available languages and select the language in which radio related prompts and information are displayed both at turn on and during a journey (eg where a change of drivers may occur).
Countermeasures that have been administered must be linked to the entity that was administered the countermeasures.
The transport of a VCD package MUST be confidential.
The application shall have a downtime of at most 10 minutes per year.
Radio equipment installed in a drivers Cab shall not obstruct the drivers vision or otherwise hinder the safe driving of the train.
In order to meet other call priorities, established calls shall be able to be either put on hold or cleared down (pre-empted).

If no full or partial match is found at all, the currently selected Application on the Supplementary Logical Channel shall remain the selected Application and - If the SELECT [by name] command has the [first or only occurrence] parameter set, the SELECT command is dispatched to the Application, - If the SELECT [by name] command has the [next occurrence] parameter set, the OPEN shall return the appropriate error to the off-card entity.
When changing to a higher speed level the rear end of the train shall respect the static train speed profile.
Where it is necessary for a CEPS system component to distinguish between on-line and off-line cardholder PIN verification, a flag must be set in the transaction
The CNG may support mechanisms supporting nomadism of the users and their subscribed services from one physical customer environment to another.
Where fixed network users are involved in a group or broadcast call, fixed network users will be pre-defined and will not change during the course of the call.
It should be possible, as a maintenance function, to enable/disable the emergency call function.
The driver shall have the possibility to select the language, this does not concern non pre-defined texts sent from the trackside.
Maintenance releases will be offered to customers once a year. The releases shall take no longer than 5 minutes for 80% of the customer base to install.
On-train mobiles shall provide a standardised interface to ERTMS/ETCS.
DSD alarm information shall be transmitted to the primary controller.
The realtor shall be able to retrieve a map showing property locations for a specified area
If the specimen/sample collection record exists, the laboratory result must be linked to the specimen collection record by the Specimen ID.
The vendor will verify the invalid lead.
An audible and visual indication of an incoming call shall be provided.
The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.
The OPEN shall Check application access rules according to the Applications privileges,
The composition of call groups shall be able to be modified within the network. A single user shall be able to be a member of one or more call groups.
If the call is a group call, the user has to request permission to speak during the call by using the Push-To-Talk (PTT) function.
The system shall display data from the Sync Matrix 1.0 and Exercise Management Tool 1.0 applications
On lines fitted with RBC, the ETCS trainborne equipment shall be able to transmit the location of the entire train to the RBC.
The search results shall be returned no later 30 seconds after the user has entered the search criteria
OM data should be synchronized so that all instances of OM applications working from the same server are able to share and use the same data.
Pre-empted calls will be discontinued and the new call of a higher priority shall be connected instead.
Staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner.
At OP_READY state,Executable Load Files that were included in Immutable Persistent Memory shall be registered in the GlobalPlatform Registry
For unload transactions, the load acquirer and card issuer must be the same financial institution. Load devices or load acquirers must be able to identify their own institution's CEP cards
The Member States shall supply the information generated from the analysis of the national context they represent.
The SECURED state may be used to enforce the relevant security policies of the security domain and applications

In the case of Cab radio, when a train number is assigned as a functional identity, this shall take priority over other Cab radio functional identities, and shall be the functional identity for the Cab radio to be displayed to other users.
Systems supporting OM must provide the ability to publish investigation-specific questionnaires and implementation guides.
If the number of logical channels supported by the OPEN is not sufficient to open a new Supplementary Logical Channel, return the appropriate error,
Where a CND invokes a session at the CNG the CNG shall record the association of session-id, invoking device identity and invoking user-id.
Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.
The card issuer must establish its policies for assigning and adjusting slot maximum balances. These policies may require the card issuer to maintain a card database
If there are failures of the trainborne equipment which compromise the safety of train supervision, the ETCS trainborne equipment shall immediately command the brake and bring the train to a stop.
A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.
If the shot was marked as a hit the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.
When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.
The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.
Functionalities related to Electronic Programming Guide and DRM management shall be implemented in STB or media gateway and not in CNG.
For group or broadcast calls, a means to leave the call without terminating the call shall be provided.
The DPU-CCM shall provide the capability to echo to the spacecraft each received command from the spacecraft or the ICU.
An audible indication should be provided to the user if the network service is no longer available.

If there are exceptional circumstances such as natural disaster, theft, etc. for which any peer is unable to honor the negotiated relationships, a given peering arrangement is not disband or re-arranged and SLA conditions are bypassed.
